info.title: DeepDEX Public API
info.description:
Public RESTful API for DeepDEX decentralized exchange platform

This API provides access to spot and perpetual trading markets, user orders, trade history, market data, and volume statistics.

**Note:** This is the public API documentation. For complete API documentation including admin endpoints, see /api-docs/openapi-admin.json

## API Endpoints

### Spot Trading
- **POST /api/v1/spot/pairs** - Get all trading pairs
- **POST /api/v1/spot/pair-by-name** - Get pair by name
- **POST /api/v1/spot/mids** - Get all mid prices
- **POST /api/v1/spot/volume** - Get volume statistics
- **POST /api/v1/spot/candles** - Get candlestick data
- **POST /api/v1/spot/user/open-orders** - Get user's open orders
- **POST /api/v1/spot/user/history-orders** - Get user's order history
- **POST /api/v1/spot/user/fills** - Get user's fills
- **POST /api/v1/spot/user/fills-by-time** - Get fills by time range
- **POST /api/v1/spot/user/order** - Get specific order
- **POST /api/v1/spot/user/order-by-tx** - Get order by transaction hash

### Perpetual Trading
- **POST /api/v1/perp/markets** - Get all markets
- **POST /api/v1/perp/market-by-id** - Get market by ID
- **POST /api/v1/perp/mids** - Get all mid prices
- **POST /api/v1/perp/volume** - Get volume statistics
- **POST /api/v1/perp/candles** - Get candlestick data
- **POST /api/v1/perp/user/open-orders** - Get user's open orders
- **POST /api/v1/perp/user/history-orders** - Get user's order history
- **POST /api/v1/perp/user/fills** - Get user's fills
- **POST /api/v1/perp/user/fills-by-time** - Get fills by time range
- **POST /api/v1/perp/user/order** - Get specific order
- **POST /api/v1/perp/user/order-by-tx** - Get order by transaction hash
